title: Great Mordekaiser Rework Idea
body:
Since so many champions have mobility now, I had an Idea for a Mordekaiser rework that would help him feel more modern!

Health: 	518 – 1997 	Attack damage: 	60 – 111
Health Regen: 	5.5 – 14.9 	Attack speed:	0.638  (+ 0 – 39.1%)
Mana: 	350.2 – 928.2 	Armor: 	28 – 87.5
Mana Regen: 	7.4 – 16.8 	Magic Resist: 	30 – 38.5
Range: 	150 	Movement Speed: 	325

PASSIVE:
High Gear: Mordekaiser's basic attacks are fueled by the spirit of metal, and permanently modified to deal 20% AD Attack damage physical damage and 80% AD Ability power magic damage.

Steel Lord on Wheels: The Chariot: Mordekaiser has minions in his base that construct a chariot for him. After 8 minutes have passed, The Chariot is delivered to both corners of Morde's fountain, which he can pick up after Channeling  for a second. Doing so grants him one cast of The Ride Majestic within the next minute, as well as 40% bonus movement speed out of combat prior to the ability being cast, after which The Chariot goes on cooldown before being delivered again.

Q:
Light 'Em Up
Mordekaiser swings his mace to launch a blast of energy at the target area, dealing magic damage to enemies hit. The blast reveals the area as it travels and for 6 seconds afterwards, as well as all affected enemies. ((TARGET RANGE: 825, EFFECT RADIUS: 250, COST: 60 / 70 / 80 / 90 / 100 Health, COOLDOWN: 8; Magic Damage: 75 / 120 / 165 / 210 / 255 (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP) ))

W:
March for Revenge: Mordekaiser dashes to the target location, destroying the ground and leaving up to 3 desolated patches along his path, depending on the distance traveled, lasting for 2 seconds. Any enemies that remain in the area are dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds. ((Magic Damage Per Tick:  15 / 22.5 / 30 / 37.5 / 45 (+ 10% AP) TARGET RANGE: 600, COLLISION RADIUS: 100, SPEED: 650, COST: 100 HP, COOLDOWN: 20 / 19 / 18 / 17 / 16 ))

The Ride Majestic: Morde rides his chariot to the target location with extreme speed,  unstoppable and knocking aside all enemies hit 500 units and leaving behind a burning trail for 5 seconds. Any enemies that remain in the area are slowed by 90% and dealt 7.5 − 25 (based on level) (+ 37.5% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) magic damage every 0.25 seconds, for a maximum of 150 − 500 (based on level) (+ 750% bonus AD) (+ 100% AP) magic damage. Casting The Ride Majestic instantly resets March for Revenge's cooldown. ((TARGET RANGE: 1800, COLLISION RADIUS: 100, SPEED: 1500 ))

E:
Machine Gun: Morde removes his helmet and and unleashes his terrifying gaze in a cone in front of him for 4 seconds, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage every quarter-second and reducing his targets' armor and magic resistance each tick, stacking up to 8 times, lingering for 2 seconds after last being damage. ((Mixed Damage Per Quarter Second: 7.5 / 10.63 / 13.75 / 16.88 / 20 (+ 10% bonus AD) Resistance Reduction Per Tick: 1 / 1.38 / 1.75 / 2.13 / 2.5; EFFECT RADIUS: 600, ANGLE: 35°, COST: 50 HP, COOLDOWN: 16 ))

Machine Gun does not hinder Mordekaiser's actions and its cone remains in front of him as he moves.

R:
Blitzkrieg: Passive: Mordekaiser stores a charge of Blitzkrieg periodically, up to a maximum of 7 at once, and starts with 7 missiles every time he respawns.

Active: Mordekaiser swings his mace and sends a trapped soul in the target direction that explodes if it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage in an area. ((Magic Damage: 90 / 115 / 140 (+ 15 / 45 / 75% AD) (+ 20% AP); TARGET RANGE: 1225, EFFECT RADIUS: 75 / 150, SPEED: 1950, COST: 20 HP + 1 Missile, STATIC COOLDOWN: 2, RECHARGE: 12 / 11 / 10 ))

Vengeful One: Every third trapped soul Mordekaiser flings is a Vengeful One, dealing 100% increased damage and increasing its explosion radius.

Be sure to let me know what you guys think! :3

replies.body: That was painful to read  especially considering im pretty sure thats  just Corki's kit
When Riot already did the job for you but you didn't get the memo.
Just by the way, but Morde's official rework is almost done (to be released sometime this year, I think).
